title: Easy caramelised onion and soured cream quiche
ingredients: ['1 sheet shortcrust pastry', '2 tablespoons butter', '4 onions, finely sliced', '1 sprig fresh thyme', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '300ml soured cream', '2 tablespoons finely grated Parmesan cheese', '4 eggs', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
